column5: Two holes after only two weeks

column1: Wunder Under High-Rise Tight (Tall) Online Only 31"
column5: Please Make More Colors of this Tall Pants!
column6:
I am size 6, and I am 5' 10 1/2" Tall (1.80cm). I got a pair as a birthday present and I love them so much, I wear them all the time. Now I just ordered a new pair so I have two... but they are the same color, as it is the only one available in Tall. Please make more colors, I promise I will tell all my tall girlfriends and IG/Twitter followers :) I am a Multimedia artist in California @daleamusic )
Anyway, they are so fabulous, love the fabric and fit so well, why only make one color for us tall gals?
Thank you!
Lea

column1: Wunder Under High-Rise Tight (Tall) Online Only 31"
column6: I bought this pair in black and they were great for the first few wears. But after that, they completely stretched out. I am constantly pulling them up when I wear them. They also pilled terribly in the crotch area. I guess that can be expected, but I would think that for the cost, they would have held up better and longer than they did. Also, the stitching on the front left side is starting to unravel. It looks like Velcro or something was stuck to it and started to unravel it, but I wash all of my Lulu with only other workout gear and there is never anything that would snag or cause this to happen. I'm super bummed about the quality of these leggings. I expected better from Lulu.

column1: Wunder Under High-Rise Tight (Tall) Online Only 31"
column6: Bought these and after a one time use and wash the fabric started pilling on the top on my thighs. You may be thinking I didn't read the care instructions but I treated them like any other lulu lemon leggings I own and have not had such a problem. Cold water and hung dry, and only washed with same fabrics. $98 and one use, I'm so upset. I've messaged the company and have had no response. I won't be buying from lulu lemon again, maybe the quality expectations have lowered..
column15: fabric after a one time use

column1: Wunder Under High-Rise Tight (Tall) Online Only 31"
column6: I love the high-rise leggings, the 31 inseam on these pants are amazing for tall women, I am 6 ft tall. I have others that are not 31 inseam and I wish I hadn't bought them because I prefer the 31 over the 29. The 29 I feel I have to constantly pull up and it's very frustrating. But with the 31 it is amazing and they don't feel like they fall down. Very happy and please make more colors available!! :)

column1: Wunder Under High-Rise Tight (Tall) Online Only 31"
column5: Don't get to attached to the color...
column6: I recently bought these leggings, and absolutely loved the nocturnal teal color. I hand washed them for the first time in cold water, as I do with all my other lulu pieces and my entire sink turned a dark color. I rang the leggings out and air dried them, the next time I put them on they where completely faded. I am extremely disappointed due to how much I spent on them.
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Hey Boston730,\nThanks so much for sharing your thoughts with us today. We stand behind the quality of our gear and will be following up with some solutions via email.', 'LL_response_date': 'December 19, 2017'}

column1: Wunder Under High-Rise Tight (Tall) Online Only 31"
column6: I loved these leggings at first and I wore them pretty often! I loved the fabric and I never felt itchy or uncomfortable in them at first. However, I haven't even had them for 9 months and they feel like a completely different fabric now and are pilling all over and they make me so itchy. I'm sad that I spent $100 on these leggings that were supposed to last me years. Not to mention that now they have stretched out and don't even stay on my waist anymore.
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Hey Youtuber,\nThanks so much for sharing your thoughts with us today. We stand behind the quality of our gear and will be following up with some solutions via email.', 'LL_response_date': 'December 7, 2017'}

column1: Wunder Under High-Rise Tight (Tall) Online Only 31"
column6: To be honest, I'm very disappointed in these leggings. I was torn between getting a 4 or a 6 but ultimately chose a 4 cuz it fit tight. column1: Wunder Under High-Rise Tight (Tall) Online Only 31"
column5: Stay in place and hug every curve
column6: These are amazing. I'm 6 feet tall so they are great and I can even wear them around my heels. The high rise is still high enough and my ankles are covered. The fabric is the same great quality lulu cotton and they don't slide/ride up (or down) during practice! Love the full coverage and that the keep me locked and loaded :)

column1: Wunder Under High-Rise Tight (Tall) Online Only 31"
column5: Yippee! Wunder Under Hi Rise now comes in Tall!
column6: I almost hyperventilated when I saw these tights on the website. Oh boy, my favorite tights now come in long and in colors! I ordered Nocturn Teal (dark grey green) and Black Cherry (dark burgundy) and now I can hardly wait to get to the gym to show off my new tights. These fit like Wunder Unders - except longer. I'm 5'10" and 150 lbs. The size 6 is perfect
